entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
